6387.quoteText:
We honor your privacy and therefore recommend choosing a pseudonym.
Of course, you are free to choose your real name, nobody stops you from this.</
6387.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
tosdr.tldr: The terms of use do not prohibit the use of pseudonyms and even offers the ability to choose a username upon registering.

6485.quoteText: Your data is yours, and you have the right to leave our service at any time.

6489.quoteText:
Third party companies can create so called "OAuth Applications", they gain access to the data only if you authorize those to.
We provide a detailed list of what "scopes" (Permissions) can do to your account and affect your privacy
6489.title: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

tosdr.case: This service only shares user information with third parties when given specific consent

6490.quoteText:
Your data is never sold anywhere NEVER.
Our Service is completely ad free and runs on either donations, or other income sources such as software sales
6490.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: This service does not sell your personal data

6491.quoteText: We don't use any third party tracking software such as Google Adsense or any other software
6491.title: This service does not track you

tosdr.case: This service does not track you

6492.quoteText: We do not have any "data-share-partnerships" with other companies, thus we only have the info you gave us.<
6492.title: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms

tosdr.case: The service does not use third-party analytics or tracking platforms

6493.quoteText:
The following list contains a complete set on what data we collect on you

  • Your IP Address (For logging purposes, see above and your login history)
  • An ID (numeric) generated for your account
  • The username you entered upon registering
  • The password (hashed with a salt) you entered upon registering
  • The firstname you have entered upon registering
  • The lastname you have entered upon registering
  • The email address you have entered upon registering
  • An account flag if you have been suspended or not
  • An account flag if you are an employee of Pixelcat Productions or not
  • An account flag if you have 2fa enabled or not
  • Your 2fa secret
  • An unix timestamp of the time when you have activated TFA
  • A history of all your login sessions (session token, remember token, IP, Device, If Session is valid, Last Login, Session Creation Time)
  • A support token for easier communication with our support
  • The language you set
  • External Provider ID (If registered with an external provider)
  • An account flag if you have registered with an external provider or not
  • Forum Account ID (If registered at our forums)
  • An account flag if you have an account at our forums or not
  • An account flag if you have enabled your authorization timer
  • A livechat token for easier communication with our support
  • Your uploaded picture to our CDN, stored as an URL. Or by default: Gravatar avatars
6493.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

6494.quoteText: We take DMCA Takedowns seriously and if you see any copyright infringing content, contact us immediately

6495.quoteText: Any claim related to Pixelcat Productions's Website shall be governed by the laws of de without regards to its conflict of law provisions

6496.quoteText: Pixelcat Productions will notify you 1 month in advance for any Terms Of Service infringtion and will issue warnings before your final suspension

6497.quoteText: This will let Pixelcat Productions to terminate upon violations of any of these restrictions. Upon termination, your viewing right will also be terminated and you should destroy any downloaded materials in your possession whether it is printed or electronic format.

6498.quoteText:
Pixelcat Productions may revise these Terms of Use for its Website at any time with prior notice.
Pixelcat Productions notifies you either via E-Mail or Account Alert upon updating our Terms Of Use or Privacy Policy.
By using this Website, you are agreeing to be bound by the current version of these Terms and Conditions of Use.</

6649.quoteText: You will settle any dispute as an individual, and not as part of a class action or other representative proceeding, whether as the plaintiff or a class member.
6649.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.

6650.quoteText: Other than to seek an injunction or for claims under the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act, you and the company will resolve any Dispute by binding American Arbitration Association arbitration.
